mapper.sql: DB_SCH_ID, EXP_DTM, STR_DTM, DB_SCH_PNM, DB_SCH_LNM, DB_CONN_TRG_ID, DDL_TRG_YN, CLT_XCL_YN, DDL_TRG_DCD, CD_SND_TRG_YN CD_AUTO_SND_YN, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_DTM, WRIT_USER_ID, DB_TBL_SPAC_IC, DB_IDX_SPAC_ID , COL_PRF_YN, DMN_PDT_YN, ANA_STS_CD
SELECT R.* FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT R INNER JOIN (SELECT PRF_ID, MAX(ANA_STR_DTM) AS ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT GROUP BY PRF_ID ) R2 ON R.PRF_ID = R2.PRF_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = R2.ANA_STR_DTM
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO WAA_COL_RULE_REL
RULE_REL_ID,
DB_SCH_ID,
DBC_TBL_NM,
DBC_COL_NM,
VRFC_ID,
CD_CLS_ID,
VRFC_NM,
WRIT_DTM, UPDT_DTM,
#{ruleRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cdClsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vrfcNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYSDATE , SYSDATE ,
mapper.select:
SELECT F.RULE_REL_ID , R.ANA_DGR , DECODE(R.ANA_DGR, NULL, '', R.ANA_DGR || '차') AS ANA_DGR_NM , C.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM , C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID , B.DB_SCH_ID , B.DB_SCH_PNM , A.DBC_TBL_NM , A.DBC_TBL_KOR_NM , E.DBC_COL_NM , E.DBC_COL_KOR_NM , F.VRFC_ID , F.VRFC_NM , F.CD_CLS_ID , F.RULE_REL_ID AS SHD_JOB_ID , 'CR' AS SHD_KND_CD , (F.VRFC_NM||' '|| B.DB_SCH_PNM||'.'|| A.DBC_TBL_NM|| '.'|| E.DBC_COL_NM) AS ETC_JOB_NM , (F.VRFC_NM||' '|| B.DB_SCH_PNM||'.'|| A.DBC_TBL_NM|| '.'|| E.DBC_COL_NM) AS SHD_JOB_NM , PM.PRF_ID , R.ANA_STR_DTM , CASE WHEN E.DATA_LEN IS NULL THEN E.DATA_TYPE ELSE (CASE WHEN E.DATA_PNT IS NOT NULL THEN (E.DATA_TYPE||'('||E.DATA_LEN||', '||E.DATA_PNT||')' ) ELSE (E.DATA_TYPE||'('||E.DATA_LEN||')') END ) END AS DATA_TYPE
, CASE WHEN F.RULE_REL_ID IS NOT NULL AND R.ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND R.ANA_END_DTM IS NOT NULL THEN '완료' WHEN F.RULE_REL_ID IS NOT NULL AND R.ANA_STR_DTM IS NOT NULL AND R.ANA_END_DTM IS NULL THEN '진행' --WHEN F.RULE_REL_ID IS NOT NULL AND R.ANA_STR_DTM IS NULL AND R.ANA_END_DTM IS NULL THEN '실패' ELSE NULL END AS ANA_STS_CD FROM WAT_DBC_TBL A INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH B ON B.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '99991231', 'YYYYMMDD') AND B.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID INNER JOIN WAA_DB_CONN_TRG C ON C.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE( '99991231', 'YYYYMMDD') AND C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.DB_CONN_TRG_ID LEFT JOIN WAA_EXP_TBL D ON D.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND D.DBC_TBL_NM = A.DBC_TBL_NM INNER JOIN WAT_DBC_COL E ON E.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND E.DBC_TBL_NM = A.DBC_TBL_NM LEFT JOIN WAA_COL_RULE_REL F ON F.DB_SCH_ID = A.DB_SCH_ID AND F.DBC_TBL_NM = A.DBC_TBL_NM AND F.DBC_COL_NM = E.DBC_COL_NM
LEFT JOIN WAA_VRFC_RULE G ON G.VRFC_ID = F.VRFC_ID AND G.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND G.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT JOIN (SELECT M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID, M.DB_SCH_ID, M.DBC_TBL_NM, M.OBJ_NM, M.PRF_ID FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR M WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND M.PRF_KND_CD LIKE CONCAT('PC01','%')
AND M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
) PM ON C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = PM.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND B.DB_SCH_ID = PM.DB_SCH_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM = PM.DBC_TBL_NM AND E.DBC_COL_NM = PM.OBJ_NM LEFT OUTER JOIN ( ) R ON R.PRF_ID = F.RULE_REL_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND NVL(D.EXP_YN,'N') = 'N' AND NOT exists (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_EXP_TBL_RULE EXR WHERE EXR.REG_TYP IN ('C', 'U') AND EXR.DB_SCH_ID = B.DB_SCH_ID AND EXR.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.DBC_TBL_NM LIKE (CASE WHEN (EXR.RELATION = 'F') THEN EXR.EXC_STND_RULE || '_' || '%' WHEN (EXR.RELATION = 'B') THEN '%' || '_' || EXR.EXC_STND_RULE END) )
AND C.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{dbConnTrgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND B.DB_SCH_ID = #{dbSchId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND (A.DBC_TBL_NM = UPPER( #{dbcTblNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
AND (UPPER(A.DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') )
AND (UPPER(A.DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE UPPER( #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') )
AND ( UPPER(A.DBC_TBL_NM) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{dbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )
AND (UPPER(E.DBC_COL_NM) = UPPER(#{dbcColNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) OR UPPER(E.DBC_COL_KOR_NM) = UPPER(#{dbcColNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
AND (UPPER(E.DBC_COL_NM) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR UPPER(E.DBC_COL_KOR_NM) = UPPER('%' || #{dbcColNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') )
AND (UPPER(E.DBC_COL_NM) LIKE UPPER( #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') OR UPPER(E.DBC_COL_KOR_NM) LIKE UPPER( #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%') )
AND ( UPPER(E.DBC_COL_NM) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) OR UPPER(E.DBC_COL_KOR_NM) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{dbcColNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) )
AND E.DBC_COL_KOR_NM LIKE ('%' || #{dbcColKorNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
AND F.RULE_REL_ID IS NOT NULL AND F.VRFC_ID IS NOT NULL
AND F.RULE_REL_ID IS NULL
AND NVL(G.VRFC_TYP,'CD') = #{vrfcTyp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY A.DB_SCH_ID , A.DBC_TBL_NM , E.ORD
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WAA_COL_RULE_REL WHERE RULE_REL_ID = #{ruleRelId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
DELETE FROM WAM_SHD_JOB WHERE SHD_JOB_ID = #{ruleRelId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
DELETE FROM WAA_COL_RULE_REL WHERE VRFC_ID IS NULL
